amendment.description: At the end of division A of the bill, add the following: TITLE XVII--CONTINGENCY OPERATIONS OVERSIGHT AND INTERAGENCY ENHANCEMENT ACT OF 2012 SEC. 1701. SHORT TITLE. This title may be cited as the "Contingency Operations Oversight and Interagency Enhancement Act of 2012".***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 51 printed in House Report 112-485 to integrate duplicative functions related to contingency operation planning, management, and oversight, which are currently spread over several U.S. Departments and Agencies into the U.S. Office for Contingency Operations (OCO).

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Carnahan amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Carnahan.
